entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 11:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -25.4°C
Wind: WNW 35 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
